00001 using System;
00002 using Gtk;
00003 
00004 public partial class MainWindow: Gtk.Window
00005 {   
00006     public MainWindow (): base (Gtk.WindowType.Toplevel)
00007     {
00008         Build ();
00009         this.Scanner.Open("/dev/video0");
00010         this.VideoDevEntry.Text = "/dev/video0";
00011         this.Destroyed += HandleDestroyed;
00012         this.UpdateMuteButton();
00013     }
00014 
00015     void HandleDestroyed(object sender, EventArgs e){
00016         this.Scanner.Close();
00017         this.muteImage.Destroy();
00018         this.audioImage.Destroy();
00019     }
00020     
00021     protected void OnDeleteEvent (object sender, DeleteEventArgs a){
00022         Application.Quit ();
00023         a.RetVal = true;
00024     }
00025 
00026     protected virtual void OnScannerBarScanned (object sender, GtkZBar.BarScannedArgs e){
00027         this.ResultView.Buffer.Text = "Scanned: " + e.Symbol.ToString() + "\n" + this.ResultView.Buffer.Text;
00028     }
00029 
00030     protected virtual void OnOpenButtonClicked (object sender, System.EventArgs e){
00031         this.Scanner.Open(this.VideoDevEntry.Text);
00032     }
00033 
00034     protected virtual void OnScannerError (object sender, GtkZBar.ErrorEventArgs e){
00035         Console.WriteLine("Scanner error: " + e.Message);
00036     }
00037     
00038     //Load images from resources
00039     private Gtk.Image muteImage = new Gtk.Image(null, "muted.png");
00040     private Gtk.Image audioImage = new Gtk.Image(null, "audio.png");
00041     
00042     protected virtual void OnMuteButtonClicked (object sender, System.EventArgs e){
00043         this.Scanner.Mute = !this.Scanner.Mute;
00044         this.UpdateMuteButton();
00045     }
00046     
00047     private void UpdateMuteButton(){
00048         if(this.Scanner.Mute)
00049             this.MuteButton.Image = this.muteImage;
00050         else
00051             this.MuteButton.Image = this.audioImage;
00052     }
00053 
00054     protected virtual void OnFlipButtonClicked (object sender, System.EventArgs e){
00055         this.Scanner.Flip = this.FlipButton.Active;
00056     }
00057 }
